process.title: How engagements run
process.body: Your team stays in control while we deliver measurable improvements.

diagnostic.title: Week 0–1 · Diagnostic
diagnostic.body: Jointly review documents, historian feeds, and target KPIs. Agree on pilot scope and governance requirements.

pilot.title: Week 2–4 · Pilot build
pilot.body: Configure Context OS, train bespoke models, and connect to your production data without disrupting validated systems.

scale.title: Week 5+ · Scale & support
scale.body: Harden for wider rollout, train end-users, and keep models refreshed with continuous monitoring.

closing.title: Ready to remove guesswork from your line?
closing.body: Book a diagnostic call to review your documentation and data landscape. We will share a concrete plan or step aside — no vague pitches.

contextOs.title: Context OS for the factory floor
contextOs.intro: A document-grounded assistant that answers operational and quality questions with traceable citations.
features: Hybrid retrieval with knowledge graphs covering machines, lines, and release versions.
Citations by default for every answer and modification.
Connectors for PDF, Office files, SharePoint, S3-compatible storage, and secure on-premise shares.
Access policies that follow your approval matrix and segregation of duties.
Dashboards tracking sources, queries, and satisfaction ratings.
coverage: Quality and compliance: faster audit answers with source passages that stand up in reviews.
Operations and maintenance: quick lookups for alarms, torque values, and part substitutions.
Onboarding: speed up ramp-up on complex production lines without rewriting manuals.
contextOs.pilotBody: Two-week sprints with a curated document set, measurable time-to-answer improvements, and citation accuracy thresholds agreed before kickoff. We leave your team with a production-ready stack and a governance checklist.

customMl.title: Custom machine learning for sensors and vision
customMl.intro: We design and deploy models for time-series and vision data to stabilise production and support your operators.
customMl.timeSeriesIntro: Detect anomalies before they escalate, forecast drift, and schedule maintenance windows with confidence.
timeSeriesPoints: Feature engineering from historian, PLC, and SCADA signals.
Predictive maintenance models with calibrated risk thresholds and alerts.
Multivariate forecasting for throughput, scrap, and energy use.
customMl.visionIntro: Support inspectors with automated analysis that highlights real defects and ignores noise.
visionPoints: Surface defect detection, classification, and semantic segmentation.
Optical character recognition for lot codes and regulatory labels.
Deployments on edge devices or secure cloud endpoints with monitoring hooks.
deliveryPoints: Data intake and labelling plan co-designed with your operators and quality managers.
Baselines and ablation studies documented for every model released.
Validation protocols and acceptance gates agreed before production deployment.
Handover with operating procedures, retraining cadence, and escalation paths.
